text: hard-boiled eggs are one of the most
convenient things to have on hand in the
fridge they're not just for breakfast
they're great for a quick healthy snack
they're rich in protein
they also jazz up simple dinner salads
top your eggs with about an inch of
water and that ensures even cooking heat
over high heat once it comes to a
rolling boil remove it from the heat
cover it with the lid set your timer for
12 minutes and this will make sure you
have beautiful yellow yolks the eggs
have been standing for 12 minutes and
now transfer them to an ice bath and
this will help arrest the cooking to
peel the eggs give them a little tap and
this helps release the show let's check
egg Oh perfectly cooked and I have to
say this is probably my favorite 3
o'clock snack so instead of reaching for
something sweet have a hard-boiled egg
instead
